help.title: Please do not mention gamechanger
help.text:
We'd like to kindly ask that you avoid tagging the gamechangers here.

With 1500 members on this server it can be a bit overwhelming... CubsFanHan does a great job of participating in #Wrigley-Cantina - if you have a question, just ask when you see him around. 

Thank you so much for supporting CubsFanHan's channel and for your understanding!
